messages.message:
I am able to replicate the issue

1. Go to build app and select a shared workspace to create project
2. Go to the home page
3. Open the converse app (without any conversations), a new conversation is getting created in the shared workspace 
In the home page, since we don't have workspace selector we are running into this issue.

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2799
Thanks, great to find this issue. Let's fix for upcoming release
